title: Appreciation of USD most likely to benefit whom

content.prompt: An increase in the international value of the United States dollar will most likely benefit

choices.label: domestic producers of premium wines sold to people in other countries
currency traders holding large quantities of yen
German citizens vacationing in the United States
Canadian citizens expecting to purchase real estate in the United States
retired United States citizens living overseas on their social security checks

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

topic.text: 6.5: Changes in the Foreign Exchange Market and Net Exports

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model illustrated by an example.
